title: Convenience and Affordability!
posting_body: This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 485 Sq.
Shaded by tall trees in a park-like setting, Parks at Treepoint provides a beautiful setting in a terrific location.
Tucked in the southwestern corner of Arlington, Parks at Treepoint is convenient to I-20, Downtown Arlington, Downtown Fort Worth, and Downtown Dallas.
Come see our renovated apartment homes and updated amenities!
This ideal Metroplex location puts you near it all - but still provides a quiet place to call home.

DR - Washer & Dryer*, Upgraded Hardware, Washer/Dryer Hookup*, Hardwood-Style Flooring*, Large Closets, Private Patio/Balcony, 2 Inch Blinds, Pool view*, Disposal*, Modern Interior Paint Finishes, Designer Lighting, New Kitchen Appliance Package

Pool Area Lounge Seating, Package Receiving, New Convenient Online Payments, Lounge Areas, Fitness Studio, Online Maintenance Requests, Covered Parking, Outdoor Kitchen, Clubhouse, Leash- Free Dog Park, Courtyard
Pet Policy: We welcome 2 pets per apartment home.
There is an $87.50 pet deposit (non-refundable) per pet and $300 pet fee per pet.

There is a weight limit of 75 pounds per pet, aggressive breeds are prohibited (Akitas, Chows, Dobermans, German Shepards, Mastiffs, Pit Bulls, Rottweiler, Siverian Huskies and Wolf Hybrids or any mixes of these breeds.)
Picture of pets and proof vaccines must be provided.
Please call our Leasing Center for complete Pet Policy information.
